title: Office of Language Access
context: [CHAPTER 321C] OFFICE OF LANGUAGE ACCESS Section 321C-1 General purpose; purpose of the office of language access 321C-2 Definitions 321C-3 Oral and written language services 321C-4 Additional obligations 321C-5 Public meetings and public hearings 321C-6 Office of language access; established 321C-7 Language access advisory council Note Former language access provisions, §§371-31 to 371-37, were repealed by L 2012, c 201, §3. Multilingual website pilot project (ends June 30, 2017); report to 2017 legislature. L 2013, c 217, §2.
